version_description: ** Checkout Enhancements - Auto fills address based on your location and what you begin to enter in address fields
Optimization
Store Details Page Enhancements - Allows customers to change their store from the My Store page

** Favorites - Tap the heart now on any product to add items to your favorites list
** Shopping List - Create personalized shopping lists allowing you to organize your next party, or simply keep track of what you like!
** Store Events - Search for events in the upcoming months or look for events at stores near you
** App Feedback - Like what you see? Let us know with a post purchase survey allowing you to leave feedback on your app experience.
** &More Rewards - We want to say thanks for shopping with Total Wine & More. Thats why we’re introducing the &More Rewards, our new, free rewards program! Coming this June!

**Redeem &More Rewards - Redeem loyalty certificates during checkout and earn points with every order!

**Search Inventory Nearby - Product out of stock at your store? Now you can search nearby stores to find what you need!

**Redeem &More Rewards - Redeem loyalty certificates during checkout and earn points with every order!
**Search Inventory Nearby - Product out of stock at your store? Now you can search nearby stores to find what you need!
**Optimization

** Simplified Account Creation - After guest checkout user can easily create an account
** Scan Credit Card - Allows customers to scan their credit card and add to their account to quickly checkout
** Persistent Footer - Enhanced navigation so you can easily find what you need
** Product descriptions - Enhanced product details to give you more information about our wines
** User Generated Content - Incorporated rich content from social media platforms featured on product pages

** Simplified Account Creation - After guest checkout user can easily create an account
** Scan Credit Card - Allows customers to scan their credit card and add to their account to quickly checkout
** Persistent Footer - Enhanced navigation so you can easily find what you need
** Product descriptions - Enhanced product details to give you more information about our wines
** User Generated Content - Incorporated rich content from social media platforms featured on product pages
**Product Descriptions - Enhanced product details to give you more information about our beer and spirits
**Product Descriptions - Enhanced product details to give you more information about our beer and spirits

**Deals - View personalized coupons and specialized offers now in the Deals tab.
**Keg Accessories - Easily rent keg accessories to make your renting experience seamless!
**3D Touch - Access deals, Find A Store, and My Rewards by lightly tapping the app icon and land directly on the desired page.

Thank you for using Total Wine & More! We regularly update the app to improve your experience.
- Complete your order - Now we highlight the required fields that you missed if you try to checkout
- Recommendations - We added some more personalized recommendations to our product pages
- Guest Checkout - No need to be a guest! You can create an account with us rather than filling out the guest checkout form
- Compliance - We made some changes to make our app more accessible to customers with disabilities

- Fixed a bug for deliveries

- Fixed a crash when customers were trying to use the left to right swipe gesture to go to the previous page

Thank you for using Total Wine & More! We regularly update the app to improve your experience.
- Recommendations - optimized product recommendations when adding to cart from the product page

We are temporarily unable to accept any new app orders at this time, you will be able save your cart. We apologize for any inconvenience, please check back soon.

- Bottle Indicators - We now show you wine bottle indicators so you purchase the size you want
- Limited Time Specials - Optimized the logic to show you our specials

Thank you for using Total Wine & More! We regularly update the app to improve your experience.

- Curbside Pickup - We are launching contactless Curbside Pickup in a few stores. Orders placed on the Total Wine app will be delivered to customers’ cars outside its stores by employees

- Compliance Enhancements - Include style updates to text color, font, theme and spacing as well as VoiceOver to improve our compliance experience

- Curbside Pickup - We are enhancing our contactless Curbside Pickup in select stores. We now offer more ways to tell the store you have arrived

- Gifting - Buying a gift? Now you can include a gift message with your purchase

- Share Shopping List - We have added the ability to share your shopping lists with friends or enemies

Thank you for using Total Wine & More! We regularly update the app to improve your experience.
**IN STORE MODE**
- Provides a companion while in-store, to aid discovery, exploration and offers when you need them​
- In Store Aisle Location - We added the aisle location to our search results, product pages and shopping lists so you can easily find products while shopping!
- Scanner - Allows you to quickly learn more about a product's taste profile, ratings, reviews and video descriptions
- Loyalty - We added your barcode to the store mode homepage so you can quickly show it at the store for a contactless purchase
** REBRAND **
- We are now aligned with our stores and social media platforms! Check out our new logos, colors, fonts and badges to improve overall customer brand recognition

Thank you for using Total Wine & More! We regularly update the app to improve your experience.

**IN STORE MODE**
- We added the ability to provide feedback so you can tell us how we are doing and what we can do to improve our in store experience.
